channel.title: CVE Feed for Livemesh -- Livemesh Addons for Elementor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Livemesh -- Livemesh Addons for Elementor

item.title: CVE-2024-47303|2024-09-25T15:17:15.126Z -- livemesh -- livemesh%20addons%20for%20elementor
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Livemesh Livemesh Addons for Elementor allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Livemesh Addons for Elementor: from n/a through 8.5.

item.title: CVE-2024-37547|2024-08-02T03:57:39.619Z -- livemesh -- livemesh%20addons%20for%20elementor
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Livemesh Livemesh Addons for Elementor.This issue affects Livemesh Addons for Elementor: from n/a through 8.4.0.
